title: Weeding Made Easy - Year Round Mulch Garden

tasks.task: Performing weed control in a mulched garden
subtasks: Observing weeds emerging in the garden
Selecting hay from a garden's storage or surrounding area
Moving hay to the location of weeds
Applying hay mulch directly over emerging weeds
Confirming weeds are smothered by the hay mulch

tasks.task: Performing weed control in a mulch garden.
subtasks: Observing weeds as they emerge in the garden.
Selecting hay from another part of the garden.
Transporting hay to the location of the weeds.
Applying hay mulch over the weeds.
Confirming if the weeds have been smothered by the hay.
